website_summaries.verdict: The latest PS3 slims down to its smallest size ever while retainingeverything we like -- and a few things we don't -- about thePlayStation 3 gaming console.
pros: The Super Slim PlayStation 3 shrinks a powerful gaming machine into an even tinier package while maintaining the same features as its predecessors: a great gaming library and a strong array of streaming services, including Netflix, Amazon, Vudu, and NFL Sunday Ticket
cons: It seems Sony isn't yet able to bring down the price of the PS3, even though some cost-cutting design choices have been made
The Super Slim PS3's odd sliding disc tray and glossy plastic encasing make it appear cheap
Also, a few annoyances like not including HD cables and the lack of an infrared IR port should have been resolved by now

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The PS3 is a great gadget. I am a 70 yr old retired male who mostly just sat around. I acquired the PS3 about three weeks ago and I cant get enough of the games that I play. Mostly golf, tennis, bowling and ping pong. These were some of my favorite games as a younger man. I played golf and tennis until I was 50 yrs old and never thought I would play again. The games are so realistic that I actually feel like I am really on the gold course or tennis court. etc. This has gotten me off the sofa and now I am getting some much needed exercise. thanks PS3.
customer_reviews.author: harold j

customer_reviews.title: Ive had this system for three years and no problems ...
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this system for three years and no problems. I use it for everything. Netflix Amazon movies games blu Rays etc. Would buy again.

Selling it like this is not new because it was modified intentionally. Next time I will just send back.

product_meta.title: Sony Playstation 3 250GB Sports Champion & EyePet Move Bundle
product_meta.description: Package Includes: • Slim 250GB PS3 System x1 • PlayStation Move controller x1 • PlayStation Eye camera x1 • Games: EyePet x1 and Sports Champion x1 The PS3 Move Sports Champions Bundle (CECH-4001B) with Eye Pet (PS3) includes the slim 250GB PS3 Game System, a PlayStation Move controller, a PlayStation Eye camera, an EyePet and the Sports Champions game. The Sports Champions game makes actively competing with your friends or family fun. Play through six different events, each with its own special control system. The PS3 Move Game Bundle offers 250 GB of hard drive space to save your favorite gaming moments, along with movies and music. With the included EyePet, you can use the PlayStation Eye Camera and PS3 Move console to project your own EyePet for interactive game play. The PS3 Move Sports Champions Bundle will provide hours of game play and physical activity.
feature_bullets: Games: EyePet x1 and Sports Champion
